name: df-coe
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4
body: |- wceq(ccoe, cmpt(s0, cfv(cply, cc), crio(s1, co(cc, cmap, cn0), wrex(s2, cn0, wa(wceq(cima(cv(s1), cfv(cuz, co(cv(s2), caddc, nat1))), csn(nat0)), wceq(cv(s0), cmpt(s3, cc, csu(s4, co(nat0, cfz, cv(s2)), co(cfv(cv(s1), cv(s4)), cmul, co(cv(s3), cexp, cv(s4)))))))))))
comment: Define the coefficient function for a polynomial. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 22-Jul-2014.)
